title: Rahu Transit in the 8th House for Leo Ascendant
summary: Rahu transiting the eighth house activates deep transformation, secrecy, and sudden shifts for Leo ascendants. Interest in hidden matters, research, and taboo subjects increases, while finances tied to others demand caution. Emotional intensity rises, making control and transparency essential. This phase can unlock powerful inner change and strategic insight when fear is replaced by awareness. Managed wisely, Rahu converts uncertainty into resilience and mastery over crises.

sections.heading: Career
points: Success in research, analytics, or investigation

closing: This transit forces transformation. With awareness and discipline, Rahu turns hidden challenges into inner power.
